text: They will learn to serve us.
Even the weakest can show supplication.
The death of the weak will please the Gods!
This weakling is not worth the effort!
They will learn to serve us.
Even the weakest can show supplication.
This weakling is not worth the effort!

{{CcoCampaignEventDilemma:CharacterTargetName}}, champion of {{CcoCampaignEventDilemma:FirstTargetFactionNameWithIcon}} has been defeated, and their warband brought to heel! If there is one thing that Chaos followers respect, it is strength. The first challenge any Chaos Lord must face is to create an incomparable army, and it is that strength that makes such an impossible task a reality.\\n\\nYour new champion will pledge their lands and their warriors to your banner, and march in your name. Remember that as your warband grows, so too does the effort required to manage it. Of course, should you desire, you can simply sacrifice them to the gods, instead. They are weak, after all, and the Dark Gods abhor weakness.
